item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation Create a virtual environment To install Magicweb, you need to have python and pip installed. First create a virtual environment: python -m venv venv. Then activate it: source venv/bin/activate on Mac and Linux, or venv\Scripts\activate on Windows. Install with pip To install with pip you can use the following command: pip install magicweb or python -m pip install magicweb. If neither of those work, try: pip3 install magicweb or python3 -m pip install magicweb.
